tool_description: Generates a complete preview of the survey showing question flow, formatting, and user experience, allowing stakeholders to review the survey before deployment.

survey_title.description: Title of the survey to preview

questions_data.description: Structured question data including text and response options

rating_scales.description: Rating scale configurations for applicable questions

logic_rules.description: Conditional logic rules to include in preview

preview_format.description: Preview format: web, mobile, email, or print

show_question_numbers.description: Whether to display question numbers in preview

include_progress_bar.description: Whether to show progress indication in preview

branding_elements.description: Branding elements to include (logo, colors, etc.)

error_messages: Empty survey data: Provide survey_title, questions_data, and rating_scales.
Invalid preview format: Use one of [web, mobile, email, print].
Questions data mismatch: questions_data must contain valid question structures.
Rating scales mismatch: rating_scales must correspond to questions that require them.
Logic rules format error: If provided, logic_rules must be properly formatted.
Branding elements error: If provided, branding_elements must be valid identifiers.
usage: Provide survey_title, questions_data, and rating_scales. Optionally include logic_rules, set preview_format, and configure display options. The tool generates a comprehensive survey preview.

preview_html.description: HTML representation of the survey preview

page_count.description: Number of pages in the survey

mobile_compatibility.description: Mobile compatibility status: excellent, good, fair, poor
